about.details:
Incorporated in 2000, Gujarat based Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds is Manufacturer and Supplier of premium grade Agricultural Seeds. The products of the company are popular for its pure cultivation, moisture-proof packaging, high yield assurance and longer shelf life. It has two brands Kasturi and Bombay.

The product ranges of the company has jumped to more than 27 crops with more than 111 varieties in a span of just 8 years with expansion in Gujarat, Maharastra, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Andra Pradesh and Karnataka with the necessary approved license. It has also successfully established distribution network of 350 plus dealers. Bombay Super has a state of art fully equipped seed processing unit and seed testing laboratory.

faqs.question: What is the Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer:
Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO is a SME IPO of 1732000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.39 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 12, 2018, and closes on April 17, 2018.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO opens on April 12, 2018 and closes on April 17, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer: Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO will be done on Friday, April 20, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, April 24, 2018. Check the Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds IPO listing date is on Wednesday, April 25, 2018.
